sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_news_category ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), domainid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(64) not null, viewtemplate tinyint not null, vrole varchar(64), createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(name), unique(parentid, text), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_news ( id char(32) not null, categoryid char(32) not null, domainid char(32), cname varchar(32), status tinyint not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, topic varchar(128) not null, keywords varchar(128), author varchar(32), source varchar(32), imagemark bit not null, videomark bit not null, contentmark int not null, videotime int not null, rlevel tinyint not null, comments int not null, lastcommentdate timestamp, allowcomments bit not null, indexed bit not null, views int not null, description varchar(256), content clob, oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_news_comment ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), contentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, ccomment clob not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_news_recommend ( id char(32) not null, newsid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, status tinyint not null, rlevel int not null, dstartdate timestamp, denddate timestamp, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_news_audit ( id char(32) not null, newsid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, apass bit not null, ccomment varchar(256) not null, primary key(id) );
create table sf_news_stat ( id char(32) not null, categoryid char(32), domainid char(32), nums int not null, nums_publish int not null, nums_delete int not null, primary key(id) );
